rules.name: Need_VCV_Medication_Info
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 6 OR (7 AND 8) ) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5

Flow.description:
Flow Actions Before Signing the Progress Note
Release 1.17.0 - Added Disposition Recommendation to VCV Medication Field. As part of the work, the flow was cleaned up and unused elements and variables were removed.
CRM 1.10- This Flow has been updated to allow the transferred owner the ability to sign a Progress Note or Addendum. There is also a bypass to prevent additional screens for Scheduling, Pharm I and II and CT progress notes.

formulas.description: Current User First and Last Name

formulas.description: Formula checks if the value is populated in the Disposition Recommendation. If it did, will hold the value from the screen entry. Else, will hold the value field value from the PN

Flow.interviewLabel: VCC Sign Note Subflow PreSign Actions {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: VCC Sign Note Subflow Before Sign Actions

fields.name: Instructions_for_Actions_Screen
fields.fieldText:
At least 1 Action and 1 Sub-Action are required before signing a ﻿Clinical Triage Progress Note.

If 'Other' Sub-Action is selected, additional comments are also required.

fields.name: Referred_patient_for_CCC_VCV
fields.fieldText: Referred patient for CCC Virtual Clinic Visit

fields.name: No_appt_avail_Advised_Emergency_Care_VCV
fields.fieldText: No appt avail Advised Emergency Care

fields.name: No_appt_avail_Advised_Urgent_Care_VCV
fields.fieldText: No appt avail. Advised Urgent Care

fields.name: Provided_warm_transfer_to_VCV_provider
fields.fieldText: Provided warm transfer to VCV provider

fields.name: Inperson_Subaction
fields.fieldText: 1 or more Selection(s) Required

fields.name: No_appt_avail_Advised_Urgt_Care_InPerson
fields.fieldText: No appt avail Advised Urgent Care

fields.name: No_appt_avail_Advised_Emer_Care_InPerson
fields.fieldText: No appt avail Advised Emergency Care

fields.name: Emergency_Subaction
fields.fieldText: 1 or more Selection(s) Required

fields.name: Referred_patient_to_higher_level_of_care
fields.fieldText: Referred patient to higher level of care

fields.name: Instructed_patient_to_go_to_Urgent_Care
fields.fieldText: Instructed patient to go to Urgent Care (UC)

fields.name: Provided_location_of_Urgent_Care_Center
fields.fieldText: Provided location of Urgent Care Center

fields.name: Instructed_to_go_to_Emergency_Department
fields.fieldText: Instructed to go to Emergency Department (ER)

fields.name: Advised_of_MA_Urgent_Care_Benefits
fields.fieldText: Advised of Mission Act UC Benefits

fields.name: Contacted_EMS_stayed_on_phone_w_patient
fields.fieldText: Contacted EMS stayed on phone w/ patient

fields.name: Unable_Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments Required

fields.name: Other_Subaction
fields.fieldText: 1 or more Selection(s) Required

fields.name: Missing_Actions_error
fields.fieldText: No Action or Sub-Action were selected. Please provide at least 1 Action and 1 Sub-Action before signing progress note.

fields.name: Missing_Referred_patient_VCV_Subaction
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Referred patient for CCC VCV was selected. Please select a Sub-Action before signing progress note.

fields.name: Missing_Referred_patient_Inperson_Subaction
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Referred Patient for In-Person Appt was selected. Please select a Sub-Action before signing progress note.

fields.name: Missing_Referred_patient_EmerServ_Subaction
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Referred patient to higher level of care was selected. Please select a Sub-Action before signing progress note.

fields.name: Missing_Other_Course_Act_Subaction
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Other course(s) of action was selected. Please select a Sub-Action before signing progress note.

fields.name: no_patient
fields.fieldText: You may not sign a progress note that has no associated Case and/or Patient. Please verify this information and try again.

fields.name: may_not_sign_addendum_message
fields.fieldText: You may not sign an addendum to a progress note that is unsigned.

fields.name: Signed_Message
fields.fieldText: Progress Note has already been signed successfully.

fields.name: Signature_Fields_2
fields.fieldText: {!Progress_Note_Signature_Fields}

fields.name: not_creator_text
fields.fieldText:
Only the creator of the Addendum can sign the Addendum.


Current User: {!Current_User_Name}

Addendum Creator: {!CreatedBy_User.Name}

screens.description: Current User is not the creator of the Progress Note and cannot sign it.
screens.name: Unsigned_Progress_Note_Not_Creator
screens.label: Unsigned Progress Note Not Creator

fields.name: Cant_Sign_Message
fields.fieldText:
Only the creator of the Progress Note can sign the note.


Current User: {!Current_User_Name}

Progress Note Creator: {!CreatedBy_User.Name}
